results.title: A randomized controlled trial of metformin on left ventricular hypertrophy in patients with coronary artery disease without diabetes: the MET-REMODEL trial
results.text_hl: Taking all this together, the data would suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might be able to regress @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@.

results.text_hl: A positive result will assist clinicians to identify a new mechanism for @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@ regression by administering @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ XL.

results.title: The Effects of Pycnogenol  as Add-on Drug to Metformin Therapy in Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: Our results revealed that both used agents, @CHEMICAL_pycnogenols @CHEMICAL_MESH:C024070 @@@PYC@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@, showed improvement of @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ levels, vascular reactivity, @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@, expression of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@, @GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_25139 @@@glucose transporter 4@@@ (@GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_25139 @@@GLUT4@@@) and calcium/calmodulin-dependent protein kinase II (CaMKII) in left ventricle of the hearts.

results.title: [Dynamics of structural-functional parameters of cardiovascular system during use of complex therapy of women with type 2 diabetes mellitus].
results.text_hl: The use of combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Gliclazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005907 @@@glyclazide@@@ MB provides advantages in lowering of @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@, contol glycemia, and lessening of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@hypertrophy of left ventricular myocardium@@@.

results.title: [Effect of metformin on ventricular remodeling in patients with primary hypertension and type 2 diabetes mellitus].
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ may attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@hypertrophy of left ventricular@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with primary @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@.
